channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Looks like cement has broken up and is lose, 19th August
item.description:
On the grass verge on the walk through next to 20 Ellison Close

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ellison Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains blocked, 19th August
item.description:
Most drains are blocked along Payne’s pitch. When it rains hard the water then flows down the hill towards other drains which can not cope with the amount of water
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Paynes Pitch, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 19th August
item.description:
Replace broken and chipped 900mm kerb - 28 days - Standard TM and signage (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 19th August
item.description:
Customer states that a water connection was put into this property in ~January 2025. Says that the reinstatement on the road and f/way opposite has been done to a poor standard, with footway surface not being fully reinstated leaving bare patches and rough edges. Asking that this be looked into and rectified.
Report on FixMyStreet
